Text:
This is SpandauBaby's torrent.  SpandauBaby tagged these files like this, not you or any dutch tagging group for that matter... that is a lie!  This is just a copy of a torrent that has already been released a while ago so it's pointless downloading something that's already been released.

I happen to know that SpandauBaby worked very hard on making these files like this, all the tagging that was involved was huge.  This uploader can't possibly claim the glory for making this.  It is not a complicated process to download somebody else's work and then reupload it again.

@Evil_Demonz_Are_Scary first off all! this torrent is not in any scene database and its been upped to private tracker UNTAGGED! i only have added "-TPB" part because its being upped to TPB nothing else nothing more i dind add any credits to nobody please keep your drama to yourself. End story!
how were you able to upload a torrent with 3062 files in it??
hehe i mean how could you post it to tpb, i thought tpb has a limit of 500 files in one torrent?

@Evil_Demonz_Are_Scary: There is no need to be nasty about this torrent. It's not breaking any rules at all. 

If you or anyone doesn't like it, then leave it alone and go somewhere else. //Mod
It is my torrent.  I am already seeding it now on another torrent and was doing before this Stun person started reuploading it again.

@Evil_Demonz_Are_Scary 

Ok, so you have a torrent, and he has a torrent. 

Maybe his is better than yours. Maybe his has better quality or faster DL speed. Who knows. What I DO know is that you are starting to sound like a dick.

There are more important things to worry about and spend you time on. 

Knock it the fuck off. Last chance. Don't push it.
For the record, am not bothered who created it first or last but am very grateful I can redownload this. Very much appreciate your time in uploading this Stun.
loves active moderators... they keep this interesting... as for the torrent great work Stun I haven't seen a collection of NOW this complete

Hi 
I urgently need now 53. please can you upload it separately as there is no copy on piratebay
plzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz
thanks

Not properly tagged - Album Artist not set to 'Various Artists'

PITA to fix to display properly.

ok first of all great upload and 2nd is this a proper remake of a torrent or does it still have songs which skip or have cut out short just want to know if theres anything wrong with the tracks unlike the previous uploads of these
I have been looking for something like this for ages!! It's so hard to find all the albums in one place. Thanks so much for uploading :)
thanks mate, been looking for eariler releases for some time now, thanks again

Greetz! Just wanted to express my gratitude for this  awesome collection. While stumbling upon this collection, again Nice work!

"The trouble with doing something right the first time is that nobody appreciates how difficult it is".
Thank you for this great collection!
